scripts.say: Huh? You're supposed to be the new White? You look weak as hell.

But you somehow beat Deut... I mean, LÃ¼tzow... Whatever, in short you guys beat that tomboy charging into battle, yelling how she's "the world's greatest armored ship", right? Actually, don't answer, it's written all over your faces!
I don't have any sympathy for that moron, but I can't just let her give you the wrong impression of Ironblood's might either!
I, Admiral Hipper, the world's greatest heavy cruiser, will finish you off in the blink of an eye!
